content:
📞 General Contact Information 📩 E-mail address: pivnoy_chel@pivnya.cool Feel free to send me an e-mail any time you want. I will try to answer you as soon as possible :D
🌍 Any Sites You can find me on Discord under username @pivnoychel. JOIN MY DISCORD CHANNEL NOW!!! I have a Steam account; my username is – pivnoy_chel. You can add me via my friend code 352518938 :D If you wish to add me on Spotify or check my playlists, you are free to do so. Technically, I have an account on twitter – the X – but I don’t use it any capacity.
❌ Where You Will Never Find Me You will never find me on -eugh- Reddit. I will never, ever create an account on Meta’s platform – Instagram, Snapchat, or any other nest for bug-people they will come up with. All the information on where or how to find me is linked on this site ο(=•ω＜=)ρ⌒☆
title: Contact Me
